Title: Abraham Stern (No. 100)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Jon Bokenkamp (teleplay by), John Eisendrath (teleplay by), Dave Metzger (story by), Jon Bokenkamp (story by), Marisa Tam (story editor), Taylor Martin (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Amir Arison
Plot: Red goes on the hunt for a legendary treasure; Liz studies the methods of one of the Blacklist's most dangerous criminals.
